org.nzdis.micro.inspector

Class InspectorAnnotationReflector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.inspector.InspectorAnnotationReflector

  • public class InspectorAnnotationReflector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the actual inspection services of the PlatformInspector.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $ $Date: 2011/09/07 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz

    • Method Detail

      • implementsInterface

        public static boolean implementsInterface(java.lang.Class iface,
                                          java.lang.Object object)
        Checks if a given object (or its recursive superclasses) implement a given interface. Particularly useful to check for collections and maps but works with any object
        Parameters:
        iface - interface to check for
        object - object to check
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the object's type (or supertypes) implements the interface

      • inspect

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> inspect(java.lang.Object objectToInspect,
                                                                                 java.lang.String inspectionType)
                                                                          throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        This method inspects a given object on Inspect annotations and saves the field values and method return values into a newly created LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        objectToInspect -
        inspectionType -
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap containing introspection results for all annotated fields and methods.
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - will be thrown if the inspected objected does not exist (anymore)

      • inspect

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> inspect(java.lang.Object objectToInspect,
                                                                                 java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map,
                                                                                 java.lang.String annotationType)
                                                                          throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        This method inspects a given object on Inspect annotations and saves the field values and method return values into a (given) LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        objectToInspect - object to be inspected
        map - map to add results to, if null a new map is created
        annotationType - indicating introspection type (e.g. INSPECTION (individual inspection) or COLLECTIVE_INSPECTION (collective inspection))
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap containing introspection results for all annotated fields and methods.
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

      • inspect

                                                                                 java.lang.String inspectionType)
                                                                          throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        This method inspects a given class on Inspect annotations and saves the field values and method return values into a newly created LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        objectToInspect -
        inspectionType -
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap containing introspection results for all annotated fields and methods.
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - will be thrown if the inspected objected does not exist (anymore)

      • inspect

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> inspect(java.lang.Class classToInspect,
                                                                                 java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map,
                                                                                 java.lang.String inspectionType)
                                                                          throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        This method inspects a given class on Inspect annotations and saves the field values and method results into a LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        map - map to add results to, if null a new map is created
        inspectionType - indicating inspection type (e.g. INSPECTION (individual inspection) or COLLECTIVE_INSPECTION (collective inspection))
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap containing introspection results for all annotated fields and methods.
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - will be thrown if the inspected objected does not exist (anymore)
